alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 10:55AM CST until March 11 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sleet and freezing transitioning to all snow during the day Friday. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with the higher amounts more likely across the higher terrain of far southeast Oklahoma. Also light ice accumulations of a glaze and isolated ice amounts up to one tenth. * WHERE...Portions of east central and southeast Oklahoma and northwest and west central Arkansas. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact Friday work day commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Arkansas, for the latest road conditions call 1-800-245- 1672 or go to idrivearkansas.com. In Oklahoma, for the latest road conditions call 1-844-465-4997 or go to okRoads.org.
